# === Java Eclipse Project Ignore === #

# Compiled class files
*.class

# Log files
*.log

# BlueJ files
*.ctxt

# Mobile Tools for Java (J2ME)
.mtj.tmp/

# Package Files #
*.jar
*.war
*.nar
*.ear
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.rar
*.7z

# virtual machine crash logs
hs_err_pid*

# === Eclipse === #

# Eclipse project settings
.settings/
.metadata/

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/

# Eclipse build output
bin/

# === OS generated files === #
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store

# === Java build === #
target/

# === IntelliJ IDEA / VS Code (혹시 열 경우 대비) === #
.idea/
*.iml
.vscode/

# === HydroClock Custom Ignore === #

# User data files (자동 생성)
.hydroclock/

# 옵션: intake.csv / settings.properties를 버전 관리할 경우 제외 X
# 포함시키고 싶으니까 ignore 에 넣지 않음.
